channel.title: Pages on Manuel Rguez-Sánchez
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Manuel Rguez-Sánchez

item.title: About
item.description: I am Manuel, student at University of Cádiz. Current Work I am currently working as an intern on a software project at University of Cádiz. This project is called “GuessIt!” and is an application for mobile platforms, mainly Android. The aim of the project is achieve an app witch an student would use to learn languages like English or German. GitHub Repository Mail manuelrdsg@gmail.com

item.title: Personal Projects
item.description: TextAdventures Developed by me and three friends (Luis Gonzaga Rozo Bueno, Juan Antonio Rodicio Lopez and Antonio Velez Estevez). This was our first game, we wanted to made a text-based game strongly inspired by other similar games such as Zork. So we chose Java as our language and we focused on the design, using Design Patterns. If You want to know more about it, you could check out the wiki.
